title: Fried Chicken
steps: Soak chicken in buttermilk for at least 1 hour.
Mix flour and spices in a bowl.
Dredge chicken in flour mixture.
Heat oil in a pan to 175°C (350°F).
Fry chicken until golden and cooked through.
Drain on paper towels and serve.

title: Pad Thai
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft, then drain.
Cook chicken or shrimp in a pan.
Add eggs and scramble.
Add noodles and Pad Thai sauce, stir-fry until mixed.
Add bean sprouts and green onions, cook for 1-2 minutes.
Serve with peanuts and lime wedges.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Boil spaghetti until al dente.
Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce, season with salt and pepper, and simmer.
Serve sauce over spaghetti.

title: Caesar Salad
steps: Wash and chop lettuce.
Grill chicken breast and slice (if using).
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add croutons and parmesan cheese.
Top with sliced chicken and serve.

title: Tacos
steps: Cook ground meat with taco seasoning.
Warm taco shells.
Fill shells with meat, lettuce, tomato, cheese.
Top with sour cream and salsa.

title: Pancakes
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter.
Heat a pan and pour in batter.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip.
Serve with syrup or fruit.
